title: EXO growl font
content:
Hello!  
I was looking for this font (the one that has GROWL and 으르렁 written)... Does anyone knows its name?

Thank you sooo much,  
Amanda.

comments.content: After all was said and done, and considering the nuances and variables of both my playing style. - [Mallory Fleming](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804154124/http:/www.linkedin.com/pub/mallory-fleming/59/64a/163)
